item.title: Trump administration bars Harvard from enrolling international students
item.description: The Trump administration has barred Harvard from allowing international students to enroll at the university.

item.title: Navy reverses course on DEI book ban after Pentagon review
item.description: Almost all 381 books the Naval Academy removed from its libraries have been returned to shelves after new review using Pentagon's standardized DEI sea...

item.title: Woman found guilty of stowing away on Delta flight from New York to Paris
item.description: Svetlana Dali was found guilty Thursday of stowing away on a Delta flight from New York to Paris last year.

item.title: Trump admin live updates: Trump celebrates the passage of 'One, Big, Beautiful Bill'
item.description: President Trump celebrated the House of Representatives' passage of "THE ONE, BIG, BEAUTIFUL BILL."
